name: choo
description: A 7kb framework for creating sturdy frontend applications

scripts.test:server: standard && npm run deps && NODE_ENV=test node tests/server/*
scripts.test:server:cov: standard && npm run deps && NODE_ENV=test istanbul cover tests/server/*
scripts.test:browser: standard && npm run deps && NODE_ENV=test karma start
scripts.test:browser:cov: standard && npm run deps && NODE_ENV=test COVERAGE=true karma start
scripts.test:cov: npm run test:server:cov && npm run test:browser:cov
scripts.test: npm run test:server && npm run test:browser
